name: server-template
description: Simple express server with sequelize, pg and jwts

scripts.start: node . && npm run dev && echo 'Creating Tables'; npx sequelize-cli db:create; echo 'Running Migrating'; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate; echo 'Seed tables'; npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.initdev: npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.resetDB: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npm run initdev
scripts.restartDB: echo 'Dropping Tables'; npx sequelize-cli db:drop; echo 'Creating Tables'; npx sequelize-cli db:create; echo 'Running Migrating'; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate; echo 'Seed tables'; npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all;

author: Rein Op 't Land
